## XForm.thisToWorld() method

Transform local coordinate to world space

**Signature:**

```typescript
thisToWorld(v: Vector3, result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  v | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | point or vector in local space |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output result |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The transformed world space coordinate
